00008 #ifndef _DATAREADER

00010 
00011 //include standard header files
00012 #include <vector>
00013 #include <string>
00014 
00015 /*******************************************************************
00016  * stores a data item
00017  ********************************************************************/
00018 class dataEntry {
00019 private:
00020     double* pattern_; //input patterns
00021     double* target_; //target (output) result
00022 
00023 public:
00024 
00025     dataEntry(double* p, double* t) : pattern_(p), target_(t) {
00026     }
00027 
00028     double *pattern() {
00029         return pattern_;
00030     }
00031 
00032     double *target() {
00033         return target_;
00034     }
00035 
00036     ~dataEntry() {
00037         delete[] pattern_;
00038         delete[] target_;
00039     }
00040 };
00041 
00042 /*******************************************************************
00043  * Training Sets Storage - stores shortcuts to data items
00044  ********************************************************************/
00045 class trainingDataSet {
00046 public:
00047 
00048     std::vector<dataEntry*> trainingSet_;
00049     std::vector<dataEntry*> generalizationSet_;
00050     std::vector<dataEntry*> validationSet_;
00051 
00052     trainingDataSet() {
00053     }
00054 
00055     void clear() {
00056         trainingSet_.clear();
00057         generalizationSet_.clear();
00058         validationSet_.clear();
00059     }
00060 };
00061 
00062 //dataset retrieval approach enum
00063 
00064 enum {
00065     NONE, STATIC, GROWING, WINDOWING
00066 };
00067

00069 
00070 class dataReader {
00071 public:
00072 
00073     dataReader() : creationApproach_(NONE), numTrainingSets_(-1) {
00074     }
00075     ~dataReader();
00076     bool loadDataFile(const char* filename, int nI, int nT);
00077     void setCreationApproach(int approach, double param1 = -1, double param2 = -1);
00078     int getNumTrainingSets();
00079 
00080     trainingDataSet* getTrainingDataSet();
00081     std::vector<dataEntry*>& getAllDataEntries();
00082 
00083 private:
00084 
00085     void createStaticDataSet();
00086     void createGrowingDataSet();
00087     void createWindowingDataSet();
00088     bool processLine(const std::string &line);
00089 
00090     //data storage
00091     std::vector<dataEntry*> data_;
00092     int nInputs_;
00093     int nTargets_;
00094 
00095     //current data set
00096     trainingDataSet tSet_;
00097 
00098     //data set creation approach and total number of dataSets
00099     int creationApproach_;
00100     int numTrainingSets_;
00101     int trainingDataEndIndex_;
00102 
00103     //creation approach variables
00104     double growingStepSize_; //step size - percentage of total set
00105     int growingLastDataIndex_; //last index added to current dataSet
00106     int windowingSetSize_; //initial size of set
00107     int windowingStepSize_; //how many entries to move window by
00108     int windowingStartIndex_; //window start index
00109 
00110 };
